name: Dr Jekyll and Mr Hyde – Extended Edition - HD
name_original: Dr Jekyll and Mr Hyde – Extended Edition - HD
description:
The EXTENDED EDITION has finally arrived!
- New puzzles
- New scenes
- New objects
- New mini-games
- New characters
- An improved interface, brought to life with the collection of key objects
- An improved gaming experience
- A longer life span

Can you solve the strange enigma surrounding Dr Jekyll?

At the end of the 19th century, a monster is prowling around in the Victorian fog of London. He has trampled on a young girl, killed a Member of Parliament, and molested a match seller.

UNLOCK THE FULL VERSION DIRECTLY IN THE GAME

When he finds out the terrible news, Mr Utterson ends up discovering that the case is not unrelated to his friend Dr Henry Jekyll and to the terrible individual currently staying with him: Mr Hyde.

A captivating adventure
Step into Mr Utterson’s shoes and set off on the trail of Mr Hyde. Finally discover the ghastly link that connects Dr Jekyll with this Mr Hyde! Can it be broken? Up to you to play!

Some useful tips
Make the most of the zoom to delve deeper into the images, and use the clues to better locate objects. You’re short on clues or time? Flush out bonus stars hidden in the pictures to earn some more!

Realistic decor
Move around in Dr Jekyll’s house, his laboratory, and the labyrinth city of London to get to the bottom of this mystery and to try to save Dr Jekyll from the danger stalking him.

The Strong Points
- Interactive inventory
- Search for a variety of dynamic, animated objects (lists, silhouettes, charades…)
- Numerous places to inspect
- Mini-games: puzzles, reflex games
- Management of 3 personalized profiles
- Help: zoom in on certain screens, limited reloadable clues, bonus stars
- Luxurious decor: high-definition images
- Retina Display
